text: @JoeBiden Now Joe, this is no way DT’s fault!  I do not support DT but I’m unsure about voting for you!  Why didn’t you run against him initially?  This COVID-19 is nobody’s fault but China!  They allowed it to happen then tried to cover it up!  What else are they hiding???
